channel.title: 2021 on CAMGDP: Central Asia and Mongolia Gender Data Portal
channel.description: Recent content in 2021 on CAMGDP: Central Asia and Mongolia Gender Data Portal

item.title: Central Asia Barometer
item.description:
Central Asia Barometer (CAB) is a regional independent NGO for applied social research.

The CAB Survey Project is a multinational empirical survey on human beliefs and values first conducted in 2017. Questionnaires identify gender of the respondents with two options included, male or female.

CAB provides free access to databases of the CAB Survey Project available in SPSS, Excel, and Stata formats.

Methodological note is available.

item.title: UN Kazakhstan Annual Report 2021
item.description:

Methodological note and information on data collection are not available.
